Бегаешь от мана 3 гена. Висишь на крюке до второй стадии. Командная работа 10/10!

还是那个问题，游戏快餐化越发严重，两个阵营的强度失衡严重，屠夫游戏压力越来越大技术越发娴熟基本功越发扎实，人类车队游戏压力越来越小技术越发生分基本功基本不在乎，人类单排就像赌博，队友不像人这局谁都别想活，队友来个人皇一整局屠夫P都闻不着一个，然后屠皇们把把三杀四杀，车队们把把四跑三跑，zzz永远都是亡了羊才想起来补牢了，恶性循环几趟下来玩家断层了，大佬们看萌新越发的萌，萌新们看见大佬就想跪下喊爹求带，再加上各国玩家里不当人的、开挂的、主播炸鱼的等等这些恶性因素，这游戏很难再有好的路人缘了。

Soooo... not gonna lie this game is one of the funniest and  best games ive ever played. You dont only play a Survivor and repare 5 gens or play a killer and hav to get kills. NO! There are many kind of Survivors with many different Perks/Abilities to Level troughout the whole game. You can rank up from Tier 20 down to Tier 1 and be one of the best players in the game. Or you can just play private games with your friends and family :D. So if you need a nice and fun game to play with friends, then get DBD.

这游戏机制，玩法都很有趣，但是段位匹配机制是真的很垃圾，我一个黄段位的屠夫，可以匹配到四个绿段位的人类玩家，这平衡是怎么做的，用脚趾头？我是真服了，红段位和白段位打我一个黄段位我还可以安慰自己人家大佬带萌新，这都已经开始四个绿段位玩家打我一个黄段位的了，而且是每一把，这就是牛逼的段位平衡？单人玩家强烈建议不要来这个游戏，屠夫没法玩。

Игра хуйня за свои деньги. По скидке норм, но все ещё говно из-за комьюнити и ебанутых решений разрабов, хотя они иногда принимают норм решения. Замены этой игры на рынке сейчас нет, хотя некоторые пытались типа Last year, но большенство из них уже нахуй никому не сдались. И ещё дохуя челов с сейвами. Ну короч помоечка с самый токсичным комунити(даже в доте комунити адекватнее).

これからキラーで始める方はやめておいた方が良いです。
他の人も書いていますが、
初心者キラーがベテランサバイバーに良い様にもてあそばれるゲームそれがDbDです。
ランク二桁キラーがランク一桁強者サバイバーとマッチングされるため袋叩きにされます。
まだ覚えてもいないマップに召喚され、捕まえられそうな距離で待機して捕まえに行けばパレットでボコられる。
ただいるだけで懐中電灯で目くらましをされる。やっとダウンをとって吊るそうとすれば邪魔されフックを壊され
逃げられる。
一回も吊れない事は珍しくなく弄ばれてる感満載です。
キラーが少ないのも納得です。
私はそっとアンインストールを押しました。

If you're looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if you're looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:

1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie

Directions:

1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing.

The game-play is generally well put together. There are certainly glitches, but that is to be expected of a game that is played by people all around the world. I'm thoroughly addicted to this game, so I recommend it if you don't plan on having a life outside of it.
got to rank 8 first time playing then annoying sweats made the game boring with toxicity so i wont be playing much anymore

Most of the game just feels like a chore to me. Run here, hold M1, run there, hold M1. It feels like the difficulty is never at a nice balance. It is either you feel like you're doing so little but just holding a button waiting for a gen to finish, or you're just running and getting tunneled by a killer. There are rare moments where it feels like the whole team is struggling but having a fair challenge against a competent killer who doesn't face-camp and keeps consistent pressure. However, those joys are few and far between, fun as they may be.

Also, the progression system is frustrating, which might have been excusable had I enjoyed the rest of the game. It involves using a limited currency you get from playing, then dealing with an RNG-generated bloodweb, where you don't even get to unlock the abilities you want 80-90% of the time. It's just so tedious and uninteresting, not to mention that you need to give up a perk slot just to effectively collect bloodpoints at a reasonable rate in the first place (We're Gonna Live Forever, BBQ & Chili). And even if you complete a bloodweb, you're just at the mercy of RNG yet again to hopefully generate your desired options for the next round.

I understand what the game tries to be, but it's so riddled with unengaging, uninteresting mechanics and needlessly grindy progression systems that I can't say that it's my cup of enti-tea.

This game is no doubt very fun and i'm sure potential buyers may love this if you give this game a shot .
But do keep in mind , this game can be very competitive . This isn't a casual game and you'll have to learn through trial and error on how to play as a survivor or killer via playing for many hours .  You'll have to keep playing to hone your skills but that does get old and the higher you rank up the more the game feel more like a chore than a game to enjoy and have fun in .
On top of that there's a lot of bugs that have yet to be fixed that can cause the game experience to be ruined . 
Take care and I hope this review was helpful .

这是一个好游戏，我已经游戏时长900+，我很认可游戏家在界面的一局话：这游戏没有输赢，如果硬要说的话，你玩的开心，你就赢下了这局游戏。但是我有几个建议，官方没必要追求人类跟屠夫配件的公平，这游戏本就是娱乐，我真的还是很喜欢1.0版本的红处决 红齿轮 红针 止血剂，这些东西看似过于强大，但是也增加了游戏的趣味性，没有必要一削再削，过分的追求平衡反而会让其枯燥，还有就是喜欢1.0版本的钩子，拆的时间会更久但是不会刷新。这也增加了这游戏的玩法，使得屠夫需要带大嘴铁手去应对。但是现在的版本虽然平衡做的很好，但是手电，工具箱只是一个辅助了，玩得好空手都一样，没有了那么多趣味性

El juego en grandes rasgos me gustó; buena idea de juego expresado con una calidad de jugabilidad, tiene uno que otro defecto pero eso se va arreglando con experiencia o quizás aporten con un parchecito.
En la escala de recomendado yo diría que cumple un 7/10: Si estás entusiasmado y te atrae la idea del juego compralo! no es una mala inversión, aunque no es un juego que me incentive a recomendarlo con ansias

Puntos fuertes:
-Las partidas pese a que son bastante simples es dificil que se haga repetitivo ya que hay muchas variantes (aunque si hay ciertos tier list que todos los supervivientes y asesinos usan)
-El tiempo de espera para la partida es relativamente bueno
-Cuenta con un sistema de Ranking el cual te empareja con personas que poseen un nivel de juego parecido al tuyo
-Crossplay

Puntos débiles:
-Pay to skill: Pese a que con todos los asesinos básicos y sobrevivientes básicos puedes jugar bien basado en tu habilidad, hay muchos personajes de DLC que traen habilidades que son muy oportunas y que no puedes conseguir de otra forma.
-Roster inicial limitado: son 7 personajes del juego básico y si no me equivoco son 27 en total.
-Matchmakin: Dependes demasiado como superviviente del trabajo en equipo, para escapar y sobrevivir necesitas reparar 5 generadores lo que te toma al rededor de 1 minuto 20 segundos a menos que tengas una caja de herramientas o que otros supervivientes te ayuden contando el tiempo que se pierde porque el asesino está cerca o porque te piden hacer una prueba de habilidad y fallas (lo que alertará al asesino e interrumpirá tu trabajo)
-Asesino vs. Superviviente: a mi parecer siendo que he jugado por ambos bandos el asesino tiene muchas ventajas en comparación a los supervivientes (quienes ya al tener experiencia en el juego pueden volverse una completa molestia pero por habilidad en el juego más que talentos)
